name: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Combine sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger and cloves in small bowl.
Beat eggs lightly in large bowl.
Stir in pumpkin and sugar mix.
Reduce temp to 350º and bake 40-50 minutes until knife in center comes out clean.
You may want to put it on a baking sheet in case it bakes over.
If you use 2 shallow pies bake 15 min. at 425º, 350º for 20-30 minutes.
